channel.title: [360 Live]Halo3
channel.description:
Since Yz85racer convinced me to get it, I've pretty much loved every minute of it, I've played online with fellixombc and Yz85racer, and it's pretty exciting :P. what are your views on the game ?
P.S - If you would like to play online with me, and most likely fellix when he's online, what's your tag and I'll add you and send an invite :P.

item.title: [360 Live]Halo3
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Crisps = Potato Chips. But the term potato chips is wrong because they are flakes/slices not chips. Americans need to get real and change Fries to Chips and Chips to Crisps.

TYVM

item.title: [360 Live]Halo3
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:9, topic:174712”][quote author=ThugLife link=topic=235165.msg2013142#msg2013142 date=1201242653]
Shut up fellixombc, you cannot flame people for not liking a game.
[/quote]
everybody i see who hates halo never plays it; they never tried it.[/quote]

I’ve played it for days, i got it a day before it came out.

I’ve played on live for days on it, thought it was the best game.

But now, seriously, it is old. CoD is seriously alot better.
